title: Venezuela oil plan: Trump’s takeover idea unlikely to shift global prices soon
description: Analysts believe US President Trump's plan to seize Venezuela's oil industry and invite American companies to rebuild it will not immediately impact global oil prices. Years of neglect, mismanagement, and sanctions have severely damaged the sector, requiring significant time and investment for any meaningful production increase. Political stability and contract clarity are crucial hurdles for foreign companies considering substantial investment.

title: Retail inflation outlook: CPI likely rises to 1.66% in Dec on food prices
description: As per a  Union Bank of India report, India's retail inflation is projected to rise to 1.66% in December 2025, up from 0.71% in November, driven by increasing food prices. Despite this uptick, inflation is expected to remain significantly below last year's levels. Core inflation, however, is anticipated to climb due to a surge in gold prices.

Known for his humor and honesty, he was also a devoted father. Tributes from athletes and fans continue to pour in worldwide.

The swift action, planned during his break, highlights a stark contrast between his public and private activities.

title: Watch: Youth’s 'bonnet navigation' goes viral; internet cheers 'new feature'
description: North India's dense winter fog has led to a viral video showcasing an ingenious solution for navigating zero visibility. A man perched on a car's bonnet guides the driver with hand signals, turning a perilous drive into an improvised navigation exercise. This creative approach, dubbed 'ADAS Level 4,' has amused netizens and highlighted the resourcefulness of Indian youth.

This marked the first time since 1888 that Australia fielded an all-pace attack at the SCG. It was also the third occasion in the ongoing Ashes series that Australia opted for only fast bowlers.

In November last year, describing the ongoing SIR in West Bengal as “unplanned, chaotic, and dangerous,” Mamata Banerjee said that the situation had reached an “alarming stage” following the deaths of multiple booth-level officers (BLOs), including an anganwadi worker in Jalpaiguri.

Citing player safety, the BCB refused to travel to India. Shashi Tharoor called the situation embarrassing, while Bangladeshi officials warned against disrespect amid strained bilateral ties.

title: 'Will face consequences if guilty': Accused prof on Himachal student death

Accused teacher Ashok Kumar vows cooperation and acceptance of consequences if found guilty. The college principal clarifies the student's academic status, while authorities assure a thorough investigation and strict action against those responsible.

title: Bengaluru job fraud: Woman poses as KPCC leader, cheats aspirants of Rs 5.3 crore; booked
description: Bengaluru CCB police have registered a case against Shamshad Begum and her associates for allegedly duping job aspirants of Rs 5.3 crore. Begum, who claimed to be a KPCC Mahila Morcha general secretary, and her father allegedly promised government jobs in various departments in exchange for money, issuing fake appointment letters and admit cards to victims.

title: 'Take care of yourself': Kolkata cabby ensures drunk passenger reaches home safely on Christmas Eve — watch
description: A Kolkata cab driver's act of kindness, helping an intoxicated woman home on Christmas Eve, went viral, garnering thousands of likes.  Munna Ajij Mollick ensured the passenger's safety, even contacting her mother and assisting her inside.  This simple display of humanity resonated widely, overshadowing his previous social media efforts.

title: A’ja Wilson vs Sophie Cunningham net worth 2025: WNBA salary & endorsements
description: WNBA stars A'ja Wilson and Sophie Cunningham are making significant strides both on and off the court. Wilson, a Las Vegas Aces powerhouse, boasts a $4 million net worth with lucrative endorsements and a $200k annual salary. Meanwhile, Indiana Fever's Cunningham, with a $2 million net worth, earns $100k annually from her contract and brand deals.

title: China's DeepSeek returns: Proves cheaper AI works again; Silicon Valley shaken
description: Chinese AI firm DeepSeek unveiled a groundbreaking training method, "Manifold-Constrained Hyper-Connections," potentially slashing AI development costs. This innovation challenges the notion that advanced AI necessitates massive computing power, following their previous success with the R1 model. The breakthrough intensifies industry debates on scaling AI, with expectations high for DeepSeek's next model release.

title: America will ‘collapse’: Elon Musk’s father warns; cites population shift
description: Errol Musk, father of Tesla CEO Elon Musk, has sparked controversy with remarks predicting a US 'collapse' due to the white population becoming a minority within two decades. He also downplayed systemic oppression in South Africa, claiming white populations significantly contributed to Black African development.

title: York family net worth: How a $13M bet turned into the 49ers’ $8.4B empire
description: Forbes ranks San Francisco 49ers owner Denise DeBartolo York and her family at $8.4 Billion, placing them ahead of Donald Trump and Mark Cuban. The York family controls over 90% of the 49ers, now valued above $8 Billion, after decades of growth tied to NFL success and global sports investments, according to Forbes 2025 rankings released in September this year.
